## Is your feature request related to a problem?

A clear description of the problem. Ex. "I'm always frustrated when..."

## Proposed Solution

A clear description of what you want to happen.

## Example Usage

How would this feature be used? Provide code examples:

```php
// Show how the feature would work
<?php
require_once './genes.php';

// Example of proposed API
$result = g::run("your.newFeature", $args);
```

## Alternatives Considered

What other solutions or features have you considered?

## Benefits

Why would this feature be valuable? Who would benefit from it?

## Implementation Notes

Any technical details or implementation suggestions?

## Additional Context

Add any other context, mockups, or screenshots about the feature request.
